attributes.action: Create a law to ban people from smoking whilst driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is illegal to use a mobile phone whilst driving, or even to be drinking or eating whilst driving, yet it seems to be socially acceptable for people to light up and smoke whilst driving. Surely, if the above items are already illegal, then smoking whilst driving should also be banned as this is also a safety issue.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
